overview: Jimi Asmara , a popular singer is in love with Sabariah a night club singer. His popularity starts to decline when pop music begins to invade the local music scene. He cannot accept the fact and is adamant about maintaining his identity which causes the Blue Star orchestra to split. In the midst of the crisis, Engku Sulaiman. But every attempt to server their relationship.
title: Jimi Asmara
